channel.title: Rc Car on sundevil-f1/10car
channel.description: Recent content in Rc Car on sundevil-f1/10car

item.title: MPC - Collision Avoidance using Motion Capture
item.description: In this demo, I have used Model Predictive Controller to avoid a head-on collision for cars trying to swap their position following their given input trajectories.

item.title: sundevil-f1/10car
item.description: We at Interactive Robotics Lab at ASU are working on RC-car based robotics platform for multi-agent research. We call it f1/10car which stands for Fast - 1/10th (scale) - Cooperative - Autonomous - Robot.
